update wms_inventory_detail set remain_quantity = remain_quantity - ( case
when id = #{it.id} then #{it.shipmentQuantity}
end ) , remain_gross_weight = remain_gross_weight - ( case
when id = #{it.id} then IFNULL(#{it.shipmentGrossWeight}, 0)
end ) , remain_net_weight = remain_net_weight - ( case
when id = #{it.id} then IFNULL(#{it.shipmentNetWeight}, 0)
end ) , update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where id in
#{it.id}
